sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sn_onesearch_searchers"> <sn_onesearch_searchers action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <additional_field_ids/> <additional_fields>cmdb_ci</additional_fields> <additional_variables/> <always_visible>false</always_visible> <background_refresh>false</background_refresh> <count_badge>false</count_badge> <description>**Please copy the sample Searcher using the 'Copy Searcher' action before customizing your copy. **The original Searcher may be updated in future OneSearch versions, overwriting any changes.  Form search widget w/ concise search results: -Utilizes legacy non-table link formatting. -Requires adding the OneSearch formatter to the selected form. Right-click the form header and choose 'Configure Form Layout' to add to the form. -(Note: list is not in alphabetical order - scroll to bottom of the standard field list to find the OneSearch formatter)</description> <dynamic>true</dynamic> <field>short_description</field> <field_id/> <form>problem</form> <hide_empty_sections>false</hide_empty_sections> <immediate_search>false</immediate_search> <item display_value="Create Incident">3f1dd0320a0a0b99000a53f7604a2ef9</item> <items_per_page>5</items_per_page> <max_results>10</max_results> <name>Sample simple form searcher (links only)</name> <new_only>true</new_only> <order>100</order> <page/> <page_url/> <paginate>false</paginate> <skin display_value="Classic Tabs">88a993ed4425420002addd3ec4bf4aea</skin> <sys_created_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-07-10 01:33:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5c5ea2974c89820002addb6a270b0661</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-30 14:15:55</sys_updated_on> <type>form</type> <variable display_value="Please describe your issue below">3f272c500a0a0b990059c24380a2bc02</variable> </sn_onesearch_searchers> </record_update>
